title: Sea of Flowers - Novel Updates
author: Jun Zi Yi Ze   君子以泽   天籁纸鸢
description: This story is about Luo Wei, a princess of an island called Suzhao and a water spirit. The male lead is Yinze, a powerful water god. The second male lead is Fu Chenzhi, Luo Wei’s adoptive brother. After Luo Wei is forced to flee from her home, she becomes Yinze’s student, and it all spirals from there.>
